description.negative: We do not deliver value to our stakeholders. We feel ashamed of our work.
description.positive: We deliver great stuff! We're proud of it and our stakeholders are really happy.

description.negative: We never seem to get anything done. We keep getting stuck or interrupted.
description.positive: We get stuff done really quickly, no waiting around and no unnecessary delays.

description.negative: We are a bunch of individuals that do not know what others in the squad are doing.
description.positive: We are a totally gelled super-team with awesome collaboration and alignment.

description.negative: We keep getting stuck because we can't get the help and support that we need.
description.positive: We always get great support and help when we ask for it which keeps us going.

description.negative: I don't like going to work and it's not much fun working here.
description.positive: We love going to work and have lots of fun working together.

description.negative: Releasing is risky, painful, requires manual work and takes forever.
description.positive: Releasing is simple, safe, painless and mostly automated.

description.negative: Our way of working does not suit us.
description.positive: Our way of working fits us perfectly.

description.negative: We're just pawns in a game of chess with no influence of what we build or how we build.
description.positive: We are in control of our destiny. We know exactly what to build and how to build it.

description.negative: Our code is a pile of dung and technical debt is raging out of control.
description.positive: We are proud of our code. It's clean, easy to read and has great test coverage.

description.negative: We never have the time to learn any new tech, skills, or methods.
description.positive: We are learning lots of interesting stuff all the time.

description.negative: There is no high-level picture or focus. Our so called mission is uninspiring and unclear.
description.positive: We know exactly why we are here and we're really excited about it.
